_exampleModule.name: The Name of the Module. Has to be a folder in the root directory of this project. Will also be the name of the output zip. Example: 'nomi-ceu-translations'.
_exampleModule.formattedName: The formatted name of the Module, used in English Lang Update Commit Messages. Example: 'Nomi CEu Translations'.
_exampleModule.git: Link to the project's github page (without a slash at the end). Example: 'https://github.com/Nomi-CEu/Nomi-CEu-Translations'.
_exampleModule.pathToAssets: Path from base of the repo to the assets folder where the en_us.langs are grabbed from. Example: 'nomi-ceu/assets'.
_exampleModule.shouldProvideSeparately: Whether this module should be provided as a separate zip. Example: 'true'.
_exampleModule.branch: Optional Field. The Branch to take the en_us.langs from. If not provided, or branch does not exist, uses the default branch.

_exampleCombined.name: Name of the Combined Zip. The Directory where the pack.mcmeta and pack.png are grabbed from. Example: 'combined'.
_exampleCombined.formattedName: Formatted Name of the Combined Zip. Used in log. Example: 'Combined'.

modules._comment: This Module has Special Behaviours connected to it! Check that they work after any change!
modules.name: nomi-ceu
